Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Shield surfing is kind of like sledding,
except you're standing on a <clr:0000>shield <clr:ffff>instead
of sitting on a sled. It's a rush!
Best of all, you can surf over snowy
patches that aren't traversable by foot.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmmm...<sp:5:0:0> You do want to <clr:0000>build up
momentum <clr:ffff>before you kick off.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Personally, I like to get a running start
or surf down a hill.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Ah, heading out? I guess we should, too,
now that there aren't any more monsters
to worry about.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You know, I wonder if the stories of the
<clr:0000>legendary shield surfer <clr:ffff>are true.<sp:0:4:0>I know nothing about them, except that
they're rumored to be in the <clr:0000>Hebra
Mountains <clr:ffff>up north. Might be dangerous.
Talk_11:

husband and I are fonts of shield-surfing
know-how!
Talk_12: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Hehe, I like your passion for the subject!
